item.title: Enabling all tests with Nessus
item.description: Nessus is one of those applications that makes me happy and drives me crazy at the same time. It does what I need it to, but it’s often hard to get it rolling when it needs to do something for me. When I run it, I run it in batch mode, which requires me to have a .nessusrc file. However, there is almost no documentation on how to create one of these files.
